titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the alternative minimum tax for estates in bankruptcy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/13/2000--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make the 90 percent limitation applicable with respect to the definition of the term "alternative tax net operating loss deduction" inapplicable for estates in bankruptcy.
